snippet: The game will be the first professional sporting event to take place in Boston since the bombings at the Boston Marathon.
lead_paragraph: The game will be the first professional sporting event to take place in Boston since the bombings at the Boston Marathon.

headline.seo: Bruins and Sabres Prepare to Play On After Bombings
